createGuildDescription: Guilds group initiatives and projects. You can invite teammates after creation.

leave.title: Leave {{name}}?
leave.description: You will lose access to all initiatives and projects in <bold>{{name}}</bold>. This action cannot be undone.
leave.lastAdminWarning: You are the last admin of this guild. Promote another member to admin first.
leave.solePmWarning: You are the sole project manager of: <bold>{{initiatives}}</bold>. Promote another member to project manager first.
leave.failedToLeave: Failed to leave guild. Please try again.
leave.failedToCheckEligibility: Failed to check eligibility. Please try again.

invite.title: Join {{guildName}}
invite.couldNotValidate: This invite could not be validated.
invite.alreadyHaveAccount: If you already have an account, sign in and accept the invite.
invite.accepted: Invite accepted! You now have access to this guild.
invite.unableToLoad: Unable to load invite details. Please try again later.
invite.unableToAccept: Unable to accept invite right now.

settings.title: Guild Settings
settings.iconHint: Upload a square PNG or JPG up to 512 KB.
settings.iconErrorTooLarge: Icon must be 512 KB or smaller.
settings.iconErrorReadFailed: Unable to read the selected file.
settings.dangerDescription: Removing a guild permanently deletes all initiatives, projects, and tasks.
settings.deleteConfirmDescription: Deleting <bold>{{name}}</bold> will permanently remove all initiatives, projects, tasks, and documents within it. This cannot be undone.

users.adminRequired: You need {{adminLabel}} permissions to view this page.
users.invitesDescription: Generate links to invite new members.
users.removeUserDescription: This will remove {{email}} from the guild. This cannot be undone.

notMember.title: Guild not available
notMember.description: You’re not a member of this guild. Ask a guild admin for an invite link to join.

noGuild.title: No guild membership
noGuild.description: You are not a member of any guild yet. Ask a guild admin for an invite link, or create a new guild to get started.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.projectAdded: {{projectName}} was added to {{initiativeName}} you’re part of.
notifications.mentionComment: {{mentionedBy}} mentioned you in a comment on {{contextTitle}}.

push.enableDescription: Get notified about new tasks, mentions, and more

version.newVersionDescription: Version {{version}} is now available. Reload to update.
version.newVersionOnDockerHub: A new version is available on
